nodes.text: The B-NK Series Subversion Droid was an espionage droid model produced by the Shroud, a freelance spy during the Galactic War. Manufactured in the Shroud's factory on Nar Shaddaa, the B-NK Series appeared to be an ordinary protocol droid, but possessed hidden vibroblades, missile launchers, and blasters. B-NK1, one of the Shroud's lieutenants, was a B-NK Series, and the Shroud planned to disseminate the B-NK droids throughout the galaxy.

Deactivated B-NK Series Subversion Droids appear on assembly lines in the final macrobinoculars mission—"The Shroud Revealed" for Republic players and "All the Pieces" for Imperials— in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. B-NK1 appears in earlier missions in the macrobinoculars line as well.
